Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
SteppingStones.Model.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
Class used to contain the information about the recipe.

    • addNewRecipe

      public static Recipe addNewRecipe(String name, int servings, ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients, double totalCalories)
      Creates a new recipe.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe.
      servings - The number of serving the recipe makes.
      ingredients - A list of ingredients in the recipe.
      totalCalories - The total amount of calories in the complete dish.
      Returns:
